DOC.brief_summary: This is an extension study for patients having unusually high absorption of non-cholesterol sterols, resulting in heart-related diseases. This study will evaluate the long term safety and the ability to lower cholesterol levels with an investigational drug.
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 52 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Patients with elevated sitosterol levels while taking current medication Patient has a condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose a risk to the patient, interfere with participation in the study, or does not meet the additional criteria as required by the study.
